title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and by Rules 1(2)(b)(ix)(I)(W) of Part 2
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Claims, Payments and Control) (Amendment) (No. 5) (Income Disregard) 
Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations and the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2023 shall be construed together as 
one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare (Consolidated Claims, 
Payments and Control) Regulations 2007 to 2023. 

Commencement
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) (amendment) (no 5) (income disregard) regulation 2023 (2) regulation social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2023 shall construed together one may cited together social welfare (consolidated claim payment control) regulation 2007 2023 commencement

title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and by Rules 1(2)(b)(ix)(I)(W) of Part 2
heading: 3. The Social Welfare Consolidated Claims Payments and Control
text_raw:
3. The Social Welfare Consolidated Claims Payments and Control 
Regulations 2007 are amended by the insertion of the following article after 
article 155: 

“Income disregard – agri-environmental schemes. 

schemes prescribed 

the purposes of Rules 
155A. The 
1(2)(b)(ix)(I)(W) of Part 2 and 1(2)(b)(x)(I)(W) of Part 3 of Schedule 3 
to the Principal Act shall be– 

for 

(a) 

the Sheep Improvement Scheme; 

(b) 

the Agri-Climate Rural Environment Scheme (ACRES); 

(c) 

the Organic Farming Scheme; 

(d) 

the Reconstitution of Woodland Scheme (Frost) 2022; 

(e) 

(f) 

the Afforestation Grant and Premium Scheme; 

the Forestry Grants and Premium Schemes.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [162] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

3 April, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection.

title: Welfare Act 2020 (No. 30 of 2020)) and by Rules 1(2)(b)(ix)(I)(W) of Part 2
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

Rule 1(2)(b)(ix) of Part 2 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare Consolidation 
Act 2005 provides for a disregard for 
income from specified agrienvironmental schemes in the assessment of means for Farm Assist and 
Jobseeker’s Allowance. The Rule also provides that the Minister may prescribe 
additional such schemes. 

Rule 1(2)(b)(x) of Part 3 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 
2005 provides for similar provisions for State Pension (Non-Contributory). 

that 

These Regulations provide 
income from agrienvironmental schemes under Rule 1(2)(b)(ix) of Part 2 of Schedule 3 and Rule 
1(2)(b)(x) of Part 3 of Schedule 3 to the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 
2005 shall apply to an additional number of schemes, with effect from 1 April
